# talking-database

Natural language to SQL query interface. Talk to your database in plain language.

## Installation

```bash
pip install talking-database
```

## Requirements

- Python 3.10+ / 3.11+ / 3.12+ / 3.13+ / 3.14+

## Development

```bash
# Install with dev dependencies
uv pip install -e ".[dev]"

# Run tests
pytest

# Lint
ruff check .

# Type check
mypy db_talk
```
